{"id":"JT-47796","entityId":"25-2027572","jiraId":null,"field":[{"name":"projectShortName","value":"JT"},{"name":"numberInProject","value":"47796"},{"name":"summary","value":"Custom widgets don't work on new project overview"},{"name":"description","value":"
build 42571

STR:
1) Install some custom widgets (for example, Cats Widget)
2) Go to project overview page
3) Try to add new widget here

AR:
There're only defalut widgets in dropdown, no new (custom) widgets

4) Go to Dashboard and add new widgets here
5) Return to project overview and Copy widgets from dashboard

AR:
Widgets are shown with error:

STR:

  1. Start YT on db with some custom widgets on project overview
  2. Go to this overview

AR:
On the first attempt to load this page there's error on widget:

build 42602

STR:
1) Open project list
2) Go to some project overview
3) Return to projects list

AR:
"YT" link is shown on the visited project

build 42711

STR:

  1. Star some project (as some non-root user)
  2. From projects list open this project twice: in current tab and in new tab

AR:
In current tab star is active, but in new tab it's grey

build 42711

STR:

  1. Update project logo
  2. In the same tab go to overview of this project
  3. Then go to the projects list

AR:
On both pages there's old logo instead of new

After page refresh actual logo is shown

build 42626

STR:
1) Make some user project owner
2) Go to overview of this project as this user

AR:
No controls for adding new widgets or editing existing one
